altername_name: テイルズ オブ デスティニー
name: Tales of Destiny
overview: Go On An Epic Journey As You Search For The Lost Secrets Of The Aetherians In This Fantastic RPG. Stahn Aileron, a stowaway on a giant dragon ship, finds a mysterious sword and becomes involved with a chain of events that threatens to destroy the very existence of his planet. Join Stahn and his friends as they travel the world seeking fame and fortune, while uncovering the secrets of an ancient civilization.
